title: Azure Administrator Associate
description: Validated expertise in implementing, monitoring, and maintaining Microsoft Azure solutions, including major services related to compute, storage, network, and security.

title: Azure DevOps Engineer Expert
description: Demonstrated advanced skills in designing and implementing strategies for collaboration, code, infrastructure, source control, security, compliance, continuous integration, testing, delivery, monitoring, and feedback.

title: Terraform Associate
description: Certified expertise in understanding infrastructure as code concepts, Terraform's purpose, and ability to build infrastructure on multiple platforms.

title: AWS Solutions Architect Associate
description: Validated ability to design and deploy secure and robust applications on AWS technologies.

title: Professional Scrum Master I
description: Demonstrated understanding of Scrum framework and ability to apply Scrum in team environments.
